processing.core
Class PSound

java.lang.Object
  processing.core.PSound
Direct Known Subclasses:
PSound2
public class PSound
extends java.lang.Object

This is the crappy 8 khz mono ulaw version that's compatible with Java 1.1 and 1.2. For Java 1.3 and higher, PSound2 is used.

This code currently does not work, but PSound2 sort of does.
